actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, April 4, 2025,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, April 4, 2025, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today .

S.Res. 159 (Sen. Cassidy):
        A resolution honoring the life of the Honorable John Bennett Johnston, Jr., former Senator for the State of Louisiana.

        -- Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.


 S.Res. 160 (Sen. Young):
        A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Safe Digging Month.

        -- Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

PN12-9:
        Elbridge Colby, of the District of Columbia, to be Under Secretary of Defense for Policy

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, mandatory quorum required under Rule XXII waived.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 39. Record Vote Number: 192 


        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote 4/08/2025.
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Moreno, at  7:03 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
